item.title: The notebook metadata dilema
item.description: The origins of this project are began one July evening in Tuscon, AZ at the 2018 ESIP Summer Meeting, when we got together to explore a FUNding Friday project proposal. We talked about some of the issues around the proliferation of notebooks and how this problem is only getting worse. We worked over some beverages and interactions with others and decided to pitch … yielding this: Here are the fundamental questions driving our curiousity and now funded efforts:
